amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for operations and administration in the International Trade Administration by $8 million and to reduce funding for NASA exploration by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for operations and administration in the International Trade Administration by $8 million and to reduce funding for NASA exploration by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Kildee.
